column190: "dc.description": "The present invention proposes a method capable of intelligence at an edge. The features include: triggering in the software layer sensor data hosted in a gateway device or an embedded system. The software layer is connected to the local area network. The repositories of services
column191: applications and data processing engines are accessible at the software layer. It connects sensor data with semantic descriptions of the occurrence of specific conditions through a representation language available in the software layer. Automatically retrieves pattern events by successive running expressions. It intelligently configures services and applications in gateway devices and embedded systems managed at the software layer for chaining applications and analytic representations. Optimize layout of analyzes and applications based on resource availability. Monitor the state of the software layer. The results of the raw sensor data or representations are stored in the local time series database or in the cloud storage. Services"
column196: "dc.title": "Edge Intelligence Platform and Objects Internet Sensor Stream System"
